original_text: On that day people will be stricken by the Lord with great panic. They will seize each other by the hand and attack one another.
korean_text: 그 날에 여호와께서 그들을 크게 요란하게 하시리니 피차 손으로 붙잡으며 피차 손을 들어 칠 것이며

sentences.original_text: people will be stricken by the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 주께서 크게 치심을 받을 것이며

sentences.original_text: They will seize each other by the hand
